entity.description: Candidate for Governor of California Gavin Newsom

text: @GovWhitmer @GavinNewsom @CAgovernor Allow elective surgeries back!!!! If people don’t die from Covid-19 for sure they will face worsen medical conditions. Surgeries could still be held in a safe manner!!! Hospitals will be overcrowded latter. How do you plan to deal with this latter?????
